Hello？
遇到楼主一样的问题，求版主解决下！
目前在 win 7 虚拟机的 IE11 下无法复现该问题

10w 数据的优化主要会集中在对图形的 batch 上，就是通过一个或多个图形画上万条数据的线，散点图就是这么做的，如果不对大量图形做 batch，不光是 js 对图形 transform 的计算，还有包括占用大量堆内存造成的 GC 开销，频频调用 canvas 的 stroke 接口的开销等等因素都会造成绘制卡顿。

你现在的数据量最好的优化方式就是像大规模散点图一样批量画线段，这点我们后面会尝试对其做优化。

解决了connect的tooltip失效的问题。connect仍可像以前那样用。

但两者同时可用看来改动会太大，因为connect的group是针对chart级别的，要实现的话，需要细化到grid级别，而且原版本中的connect是不区分tooltip触发来源的，所以如果其中一个chart还包括一个饼图之类的，这个饼图的tooltip事件也会联动到另一个chart的2d图上。
设置 `itemStyle.normal.color`

哦，今早又试了，原来是配置seriesIndex这个是起作用的，造成 对其他series也发生作用是因为
{   type: 'map',            mapType: 'china'｝时漏了  name: 'iphone5'造成的。
各国上面都添加国旗怎么办？3Q

Sankey diagram can't set a global color in `series.itemStyle.normal.color` since each node needs to be encoded to a different color. Instead you can using a color palette like following

``` js
series: [{
  type: 'sankey',
  color: ['#fff']
}]
```

Looks like it's now fixed in v3.1.9, but didn't work in v3.1.7

Anyway, thanks for looking at this, this sankey diagram is awesome!

Like this?

![qq20160512123912](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9654650/15204330/cde900a0-183e-11e6-9992-019b9fc9c3aa.jpg)

I still think it should be possible to use colors for individual items (as defined in the docs). Using palette means that color order matches nodes order in the sankey diagram + number of colors would need the be the same as number of nodes (if we want to match exact color). 

In this example, each category (Business, Materials,.. ): 

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/561365/15204657/01a905fe-1810-11e6-97a0-04c50e5e7a65.png)

has its own color which is hard to set using color palette, considering there are variable number of countries on the right. 

If color can be set on individual nodes, this should be easy + it would be consistent with other charts too. At least make this as enhancement?
Yeah, that would be great to be able to do this. Is this generated using mark points @chaegumi? The issue with that is that you need to get centroids of regions manually..
Agree with that. Setting `itemStyle.normal.color` for each node has been supported in commit https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/commit/d0a171ff2a94542bc95eb4e0785e1f3022c37549
This is awesome @pissang thanks heaps!

Thanks @chaegumi ! Yeah, using scatter is probably a better option that mark points.. 

One improvement that @pissang suggested is using coordinate system to get centroid geo cords of regions:

```
    var model = chart.getModel();

    var geo = chart.getModel().getComponent('series').coordinateSystem; // if your series[0] is geo
    var geoCord = geo.getRegion(regionName).center; // regionName as specified in geojson
```

The only thing is that you need to do this after your load your chart first time and then chart.setOption() again. There doesn't seem to be a way to get into the coordinateSystem component without running it first time as far as I understand.. 

Anyway, thanks for your suggestion!

不，我的意思不是初始化三个on的， 而是一直限制最大on的数量。

譬如限制最大现实数量为3： 大娃-on 二娃-on 三娃-on 四娃-off 五娃-off 六娃-off 七娃-off
